name: Elder Vampire
description: The Elder Vampire is a strong undead creature with formidable combat capabilities and a mastery of manipulation. It has exceptional physical attributes and can transform into mist, making it a challenging foe to defeat.
memorable: Its ability to charm targets and raise them as vampire spawn makes it a terrifying adversary.
goals: To dominate and manipulate others while replenishing its own power by draining life.
relations: May be encountered alongside lesser vampires or undead minions that it controls.
environment: Typically found in dark and secluded lairs, often where soil from its homeland is kept.
strengths: High attributes in Strength and Constitution, notable resistances, and multiple abilities that enhance its survivability and manipulation.
weaknesses: Susceptible to sunlight and running water, which deal radiant damage and negate some of its abilities.
attacks: Capable of delivering bludgeoning and necrotic damage with its grab attack and can charm its victims.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to regain hit points each turn unless it takes radiant damage.
senses: Possesses exceptional senses with truesight and darkvision, allowing it to see even in conditions of magical darkness.
skills: Proficient in perception, stealth, and persuasion, showcasing its combat and social capabilities.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance enables it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Misty Recovery allows it to transform into mist instead of dying.
Resting Place is essential for its power recovery and resurrection.
Blood Frenzy increases its action frequency when bloodied.
Shapechange allows it to assume the form of beasts.
test_queries: powerful undead manipulator in dark lairs
vampire with mist form and regeneration
Elder Vampire that can charm and raise minions
undead creature with resistance to necrotic damage
vampire that fears sunlight and running water
